snippet: A third police official close to Wang Lijun, the former police chief of Chongqing who set off a national political scandal after confiding secrets to American officials, has been dismissed.
abstract: Central investigators in China detain police officials Tang Jianhua and Wang Pengfei, who have close ties to Wang Lijun, former Chongqing police chief who set off a national political scandal by confiding suspicions of a murder plot to American officials.
lead_paragraph: A third police official close to Wang Lijun, the former police chief of Chongqing who set off a national political scandal after confiding secrets to American officials, has been dismissed.

headline.seo: China Holds Police Officials With Ties to Wang Lijun
headline.main: Chinese Police Officials Linked to Target in Chongqing Scandal Are Detained
headline.print_headline: China Detains 2 Tied to Official Who Set Off Scandal
